sentence: Today's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index volume reaching the 10th place in the top ten list for this year.
The last time the index closed above 3.32 billion shares was on Mar 13 2018.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 3.38 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 5.35 to 1 ratio.
There were 497 advancers and 2658 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 5 stocks reached a 52 week high and 499 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -4.63% for the day; a total of -329.52 points.
NVIDIA Corporation ( NVDA ) had the largest percent change down (-9.79%) while Pepsico, Inc. ( PEP ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.57%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -2.41% for the day; a total of -608.01 points.
United Technologies Corporation ( UTX ) had the largest percent change down (-6.11%) while Procter & Gamble Company (The) ( PG ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.64%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
